title: Miners
summary: Miners are industrial ships that come in a variety of sizes, but share the same focus on mining efficiency. They can harvest ores in vast quantities, but are far worse at defending themselves and fending off pirates or other combat ships of the same size.
full_text:
Miners are industrial ships that come in a variety of sizes, but share the same focus on mining efficiency. They can harvest ores in vast quantities, but are far worse at defending themselves and fending off pirates or other combat ships of the same size.

content_structure.title: Miners
content_structure.content:
Miners are industrial ships that come in a variety of sizes, but share the same focus on mining efficiency. They can harvest ores in vast quantities, but are far worse at defending themselves and fending off pirates or other combat ships of the same size.
